name: Glaeria
description:
Glaeria is a strategy game where you have to collect resources to create new animals in order to survive the waves of enemies.

Inspired by games like Age of Empires, Bad North or Clash of Clans, our game puts the focus on controlling a set of troops of animals on their objective of protecting their base.

  • Balance between 3 main resources (Wood, Rocks and Meat), needed to create and maintain your animals.
  • A set of 5 different animals to choose for your team! Each one has different characteristics.
  • Use resources to build deffenses and means of production for your resources.

PAY ATENTTION SOLDIER, HERE ARE THE CONTROLS:

B : construction menuSPACE BAR: set buildingASDW/ARROWS:  camera movementLEFT CLICK +DRAG WITH THE MOUSE: select groupLEFT CLICK: selectRIGHT CLICK: move/attack/dig for resourcesESC/P: pause
